meanings.definition: A large shopping center with a variety of stores and entertainment options.
meanings.sent1: My family went to the megamalls to buy new clothes for school.
meanings.sent2: During the weekend, many people visit the megamalls to shop and have fun.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a kid in a candy store at the megamalls, so many things to see!
meanings.sent4: The megamalls were a bustling hive of activity, with shoppers darting in and out of stores.
meanings.sent5: The megamalls stood tall and colorful, beckoning shoppers from afar.

meanings.definition: The act of visiting or shopping at a large retail complex.
meanings.sent1: After school, we planned a trip to the megamalls to hang out and shop.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the megamalls so much that she visited them every weekend.
meanings.sent3: We made a game out of who could find the weirdest item at the megamalls.
meanings.sent4: In her dreams, the megamalls transformed into a magical wonderland of shopping.
meanings.sent5: The megamalls beckoned to her, promising a day of excitement and new discoveries.
